thread.title: George Clooney to reconsider priorities if he wants to save marriage with Amal
thread.title_full: George Clooney to reconsider priorities if he wants to save marriage with Amal

author: Zeba Khan
title: George Clooney to reconsider priorities if he wants to save marriage with Amal
text:
Things aren’t exactly bright between George Clooney and his wife Amal Clooney with reports suggesting that she’s contemplating returning to Europe while George stays back in the US. Reports suggest that George and Amal Clooney’s “marriage is said to be at a crossroads”.
Marriage in trouble?
The news gained momentum when George Clooney made his Broadway debut with Good Night, and Good luck on the stage at New York’s Winter Garden Theatre to strong reviews and record-breaking ticket sales but Amal went missing from the big night.
When asked about his wife’s absence, George told the press, that she was home “with the kids,” 7-year-old twins Alexander and Ella.
Met Gala 2024 Flashback! A look at best, weird and worst outfits of last year's fashion parade
George needs to rearrange his priorities
Radar Online, however, cited an insider source who said, “Certainly, they have options when it comes to childcare so that Amal could get away for a couple of hours.”
George Clooney Reacts To Donald Trump's 'Fake Movie Star' Remark
“People were whispering, wondering whether there might be trouble in the marriage.”
Insider said that George Clooney “respects and loves Amal,” and added, he just “needs to rearrange his priorities and put his wife and family first.”
